title: Sleeve, 1901–25
medium:
Medium: piña (pineapple) fiber, cotton
Technique: embroidered plain weave
description: Fine sheer piña cloth ground. Scattered with tiny white embroidered floral motifs; deep border of white embroidered drawnwork with symmetrical design of lobed medallions enclosing ribboned wreath encircling flower arrangement. Broad scallops at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sleeve, 1901–25.
1901–25. Medium: piña (pineapple) fiber, cotton
Technique: embroidered plain weave. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-83.
